fig.title: Solution architecture: Linux workers with Prometheus and Grafana

body.p: The Prometheus and Grafana services are declared in a Docker stack as replicated services with one replica each, so if they fail, Docker EE will ensure that they are restarted on one of the UCP VMs. cAdvisor and node-exporter are declared in the same stack as global services, so Docker EE will ensure that there is always one copy of each running on every machine in the cluster.
